files.name: .gitignore
files.content:
#################
## Super ignore and unignore
#################


#!BUILDS/*
#!ICON_SOURCE/*
#!OLD_FILES/*
#!Shader Forge/Assets/ShaderForge/*
#!Shader Forge/Assets/ShaderForge/Editor/*
#!Shader Forge/Assets/ShaderForge/Editor/Interface/*
#!Shader Forge/Assets/ShaderForge/Editor/Interface/Nodes/*


###########
#SF ignores
###########
*ShaderForgeInternal.mat
*NewShader.shader

CLEANUP/*
OLD_FILES/AutoPlaceScreenshots*
Shader Forge/Assets/Experiments/*
Shader Forge/Assets/LOCAL/*
Shader Forge/Assets/LOCAL.meta
Shader Forge/Assets/Experiments.meta
Shader Forge/Assets/Emily/*
Shader Forge/Assets/Emily.meta
Shader Forge/Assets/AssetStoreTools/*
Shader Forge/Assets/AssetStoreTools.meta

Shader Forge/Assets/ConsolePro/*
Shader Forge/Assets/ConsolePro.meta

Shader Forge/Assets/Editor/*
Shader Forge/Assets/Editor.meta

Shader Forge/Assets/Quixel/*
Shader Forge/Assets/Quixel.meta

Shader Forge/Assets/Allegorithmic/*
Shader Forge/Assets/Allegorithmic.meta

Shader Forge/Assets/PBL Experiment/*
Shader Forge/Assets/PBL Experiment.meta

Shader Forge/Assets/Disney/*
Shader Forge/Assets/Disney.meta

Shader Forge/Assets/lmtest2/*
Shader Forge/Assets/lmtest2.meta

Shader Forge/Assets/templmtest/*
Shader Forge/Assets/templmtest.meta

Shader Forge/Assets/UNDO TESTER/*
Shader Forge/Assets/UNDO TESTER.meta

Shader Forge/Assets/Standard Assets/*
Shader Forge/Assets/Standard Assets.meta

Shader Forge/Assets/ConsolePro/*
Shader Forge/Assets/ConsolePro.meta

Shader Forge/Assets/Alpha Tests/*
Shader Forge/Assets/Alpha Tests.meta

Shader Forge/Assets/StrumpyShaderEditor/*
Shader Forge/Assets/StrumpyShaderEditor.meta

Shader Forge/Assets/LightmapTestNew/*
Shader Forge/Assets/LightmapTestNew.meta
Shader Forge/Assets/Marmoset/*
Shader Forge/Assets/Marmoset.meta
Shader Forge/Assets/FG13/*
Shader Forge/Assets/FG13.meta
Shader Forge/Assets/Misc/*
Shader Forge/Assets/Misc.meta
Shader Forge/Assets/Downloaded/*
Shader Forge/Assets/Downloaded.meta
Shader Forge/Assets/TemporaryTests/*
Shader Forge/Assets/TemporaryTests.meta
Shader Forge/Assets/Gizmos/*
Shader Forge/Assets/Gizmos.meta
Shader Forge/Assets/Triss/*
Shader Forge/Assets/Triss.meta
Shader Forge/Assets/Fractals/*
Shader Forge/Assets/Fractals.meta

#################
## Unity
#################



Library/
Temp/
Assembly-CSharp*.*
*.sln
*.exe
iosbuild/
androidbuild/
macbuild.app/
*.pyc
*.pyc.meta
TestFlightSDK.meta
Templates.meta
builds/
*.booproj
*.pidb
*.unityproj
*.userprefs
*-tk2d.asset

#################
## Eclipse
#################

*.pydevproject
.project
.metadata
bin/
tmp/
*.tmp
*.bak
*.swp
*~.nib
local.properties
.classpath
.settings/
.loadpath

# External tool builders
.externalToolBuilders/

# Locally stored "Eclipse launch configurations"
*.launch

# CDT-specific
.cproject

# PDT-specific
.buildpath


#################
## Visual Studio
#################

## Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and
## files generated by popular Visual Studio add-ons.

# User-specific files
*.suo
*.user
*.sln.docstates

# Build results
[Dd]ebug/
[Rr]elease/
*_i.c
*_p.c
*.ilk
*.pch
*.pdb
*.pgc
*.pgd
*.rsp
*.sbr
*.tlb
*.tli
*.tlh
*.tmp
*.vspscc
.builds
*.dotCover

## TODO: If you have NuGet Package Restore enabled, uncomment this
#packages/

# Visual C++ cache files
ipch/
*.aps
*.ncb
*.opensdf
*.sdf

# Visual Studio profiler
*.psess
*.vsp

# ReSharper is a .NET coding add-in
_ReSharper*

# Installshield output folder
[Ee]xpress

# DocProject is a documentation generator add-in
DocProject/buildhelp/
DocProject/Help/*.HxT
DocProject/Help/*.HxC
DocProject/Help/*.hhc
DocProject/Help/*.hhk
DocProject/Help/*.hhp
DocProject/Help/Html2
DocProject/Help/html

# Click-Once directory
publish

# Others
[Bb]in
sql
TestResults
*.Cache
ClientBin
stylecop.*
~$*
*.dbmdl
Generated_Code #added for RIA/Silverlight projects

# Backup & report files from converting an old project file to a newer
# Visual Studio version. Backup files are not needed, because we have git ;-)
_UpgradeReport_Files/
Backup*/
UpgradeLog*.XML



############
## Windows
############

# Windows image file caches
Thumbs.db

# Folder config file
Desktop.ini


#############
## Python
#############

*.py[co]

# Packages
*.egg
*.egg-info
dist
build
eggs
parts
bin
var
sdist
develop-eggs
.installed.cfg

# Installer logs
pip-log.txt

# Unit test / coverage reports
.coverage
.tox

#Translations
*.mo

#Mr Developer
.mr.developer.cfg

# Mac crap
*.DS_Store
dittochar.sh
dittohome.sh
dittoproperties.sh
dittovehicles.sh


SF_DLL_BUILDER/ShaderForge/Properties/AssemblyInfo.cs
SF_DLL_BUILDER/ShaderForge/ShaderForge.csproj
SF_DLL_BUILDER/
Shader Forge/.idea
Shader Forge/.vs

files.name: README.md
files.content:
hey everyone~

I will occasionally update this repository with fixes and features!
I'll mostly do compatibility updates for future versions of Unity whenever I need it. if you want older versions, consider pulling one of the older branches! I'll try to name branches helpfully. the oldest version of SF you can get is for Unity 5.x

also, please don't pressure me into doing or fixing things because holy heck I was burnt out at the end of Shader Forge's first lifetime üëÄ I'm mostly working on this casually, either when I need a fix or a new feature, or when I have time to fix something other people really want to see fixed!

also, if you enjoy or are currently enjoying or finding Shader Forge useful, please consider supporting me, if you're able to!

you can either do a one-time donation on PayPal at https://www.paypal.me/acegikmo ‚ú®

or a monthly donation on Patreon at https://www.patreon.com/acegikmo üíñ

support is entirely optional though, I intend to keep this project open and free, but if you do donate, thank you so hecking much!! if you want to reach me, Twitter is the best place https://twitter.com/FreyaHolmer üê¶

~ Freya

-------------------------------
